name: The Poker Player
credits:
HSymbol - original game
Rita-Bernstein - ZHS translation
description:
Adds a character called The Poker Player, who fights with his own rule inspired from poker.

- Adds 87 cards and 13 relics.
- Has 2 options in the config.
  - Enable Poker Player exclusive event for other characters in the config.
  - Disable unbalanced base game contents(on by default).

v0.8.0 (2019-04-23)
- Starting deck change: one of 3 of diamonds became 5 of diamonds.
- Straight now gives you +200% Showdown Bonus(was 150%)
- New Card: Poor Copy, Harden, Waste Collection
- New Relic: Broken Clock, Stuffed Pocket(Reworked)
- Major balance change and rework on a lot of cards!
- Jack of Spades now counts as a Spades for Variety Attack and Showdown
- Fixed bug Wild Card/Flying Card interaction
- Relics buffed: Bottled Poker, Splitter, Cool Box, Fair License

v0.8.1 ~ 0.8.3
- Fixed crash when playing in ZHS
- Fixed Spade Strike not generating ethereal card

v0.8.4
- ZHS update
- Poker Calculator is no longer draggable while selecting cards.
